verbose_text: In the present study, brusatol induced degradation of HIF-1alpha reduced HRE promoter activity by 8-10-fold, thereby decreasing the expression of its target genes, including Glut1, PGK1, PDK1, and CA9.
evidence: HIF-1alpha reduced HRE promoter activity by 8-10-fold                                     , thereby decreasing the expression of its target genes, including Glut1, PGK1, PDK1
